name: CC UDP/IP Socket
desc:
I/O socket that allows communication via UDP/IP connection.

Accepts inter-plugin configuration values:
    { "udp.host": "example.com"} - Override the remote host configuration
    { "udp.port": 1234} - Override the remote port configuration.
    { "udp.local_port": 1234} - Override the local port configuration.
    { "udp.broadcast_mask": "255.255.255.255" } - Override the default broadcast mask.
    { "network.host": "example.com"} - Alias to "udp.host".
    { "network.port": 1234} - Alias to "udp.port".
    { "network.local_port": 1234} - Alias to "udp.local_port".
    { "network.broadcast_mask": 1234} - Alias to "udp.broadcast_mask".

Supported message properties:
    { "udp.broadcast": true } - Broadcast the packet.
    { "udp.broadcast_mask": "255.255.255.255" } - Override the configured broadcast mask.
